mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRADE_TABLE(TRADE_TITLE, TRADE_NICK, TRADE_CONTENT,TRADE_MONEY, TRADE_AREA, TRADE_CATEGORY, TRADE_IMG , TRADE_UUID) VALUES( #{trade_title},#{trade_nick}, #{trade_content}, #{trade_money}, #{trade_area}, #{trade_category}, #{trade_img},#{trade_uuid})
mapper.update: UPDATE TRADE_TABLE SET TRADE_TITLE = #{trade_title}, TRADE_MONEY= #{trade_money}, TRADE_CONTENT= #{trade_content} WHERE TRADE_SEQ= #{trade_seq}
UPDATE TRADE_TABLE SET trade_reporting = 1 WHERE TRADE_SEQ= #{trade_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TRADE_TABLE WHERE 1=1 AND TRADE_CATEGORY LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCategory} ,'%') ORDER BY trade_seq DESC
SELECT * FROM TRADE_TABLE WHERE 1=1 AND TRADE_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchInput} ,'%') ORDER BY trade_seq DESC
SELECT * FROM TRADE_TABLE WHERE 1=1 AND TRADE_NICK LIKE CONCAT('%', #{trade_nick} ,'%') ORDER BY TRADE_NICK DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TRADE_TABLE SET TRADE_REVIEW=#{trade_review} WHERE TRADE_SEQ=#{trade_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM trade_table WHERE 1=1 AND TRADE_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchMypageKeyword} ,'%')ORDER BY trade_seq DESC AND TRADE_BUYINFO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchMypageKeyword} ,'%')ORDER BY trade_seq DESC AND TRADE_UUID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{trade_uuid} ,'%')ORDER BY trade_seq DESC AND TRADE_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', "" ,'%')ORDER BY trade_seq DESC LIMIT #{listcnt} OFFSET #{start}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM trade_table WHERE 1=1 AND TRADE_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchMypageKeyword},'%') AND TRADE_BUYINFO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchMypageKeyword} ,'%') AND TRADE_UUID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{trade_uuid} ,'%') AND TRADE_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', "" ,'%')
